page.title: 08Charities
page.content: {CHARITIES. } Our school,Christ church is very interested in helping other people.We have worked very hard this year to help several charities.Our parents and friends have helped us very generously,even though some are unemployed .We gave Â£12 to help research into cot deaths.Some little babies die in their sleep and no explanation can be found.We collected Â£65 for the Church Missionary Society which is helping people in{Lebanon} with their problems caused by the civil war.We also gave Â£40 to Christian Aid to help the Buffalo Bank for poor families in Trualand .If they own a buffalo,they can grow more rice .We gave Foxfield,a school for handicapped children,Â£365.We raised Â£375 for Guide Dogs for the blind.we raise money by many different things..
